articles.title: Poland accuses Germany of trying to turn EU into 'Fourth Reich' - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: The head of the country's ruling Law and Justice party said Berlin was using the European Court of Justice to push its federalist ideas
articles.content:
Germany has been accused of trying to turn the European Union into a federal "German Fourth Reich" by the head of Poland's ruling party, Jaroslaw Kaczynski.

articles.title: COVID vaccination hesitancy inspires some of Europe’s most bizarre rules - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Efforts in Europe to encourage vaccine use through certificates proving vaccination, a negative test result or evidence of having had COVID have created a mountain of regulation.
